    163. 
            

            
              
            

                    if current_paragraph.any?
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                      text = current_paragraph.join(" ")
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                      sentence_count = text.scan(/[.!?]+/).size
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                      long_paragraphs << text if sentence_count > 5
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                      current_paragraph = []
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                    current_paragraph << line unless line.start_with?('#')
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                if long_paragraphs.empty?
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "No long paragraphs found"
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                  return markdown
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Found #{long_paragraphs.size} long paragraphs"
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                prompt = <<~PROMPT
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                  This article has paragraphs that are too long. Break them into shorter, more readable chunks.
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                  ARTICLE:
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{markdown}
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                  INSTRUCTIONS:
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                  1. Find paragraphs with more than 4-5 sentences
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                  2. Break them into 2-3 smaller paragraphs
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                  3. Each paragraph should be 2-4 sentences max
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                  4. Maintain logical flow and coherence
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                  5. Don't change the content, just the paragraph structure
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                  6. Return the full improved article in markdown
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                  7. Keep all headings, lists, and formatting intact
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                PROMPT
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                client = Ai::ClientService.for_article_improvement
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                response = client.chat(
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                  messages: [{ role: "user", content: prompt }],
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                  max_tokens: 4000,
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                  temperature: 0.7
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                return markdown unless response[:success]
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                response[:content].strip
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Pass 3 failed: #{e.message}"
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                markdown # Return original on error
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      212.

    app/services/article_outline_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    143 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 143 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            
              
            

            # app/services/article_outline_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            # Generates a structured JSON outline for an SEO article based on SERP research
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            class ArticleOutlineService
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(keyword, serp_data, voice_profile: nil, target_word_count: nil)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                @keyword = keyword
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                @serp_data = serp_data
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                @voice_profile = voice_profile
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                @target_word_count = target_word_count
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Generating outline for: #{@keyword}"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                outline = generate_outline
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                if outline.nil?
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "Outline generation failed"
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  return { data: nil, cost: 0.01 }
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Outline generated: #{outline['sections']&.size || 0} sections, #{outline['target_word_count']} words"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                { data: outline, cost: 0.01 } # Gemini 2.5 Flash is very cheap
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

              def generate_outline
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                common_topics = @serp_data['common_topics']&.join(', ') || 'general information'
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                content_gaps = @serp_data['content_gaps']&.join(', ') || 'unique insights'
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                avg_word_count = @serp_data['average_word_count'] || 2000
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                # Use user-provided target_word_count, or calculate based on competitors
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                target_word_count = @target_word_count || [avg_word_count * 1.2, 2000].max.to_i
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get example companies and stats from SERP data
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                examples = @serp_data['detailed_examples'] || []
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                statistics = @serp_data['statistics'] || []
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                examples_preview = examples.take(5).map { |ex|
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                  "- #{ex['company']}: #{ex['what_they_did']}  #{ex['outcome']}"
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                }.join("\n")
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                stats_preview = statistics.take(5).map { |stat|
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                  "- #{stat['stat']} (#{stat['source']})"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                }.join("\n")
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                prompt = <<~PROMPT
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                  You are an expert SEO content strategist creating article outlines.
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  TARGET KEYWORD: "#{@keyword}"
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                  COMPETITIVE ANALYSIS:
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Common topics competitors cover: #{common_topics}
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Content gaps to exploit: #{content_gaps}
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Average competitor word count: #{avg_word_count} words
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Your target: #{target_word_count} words (beat them by 20%)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  AVAILABLE REAL EXAMPLES:
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{examples_preview.presence || "No examples available"}
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                  AVAILABLE STATISTICS:
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{stats_preview.presence || "No statistics available"}
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{voice_profile_instructions}
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                  Create a comprehensive, SEO-optimized outline that:
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                  1. Covers all common topics (to be competitive)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  2. Exploits content gaps (to rank better)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                  3. Uses real examples and statistics provided above
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  4. Targets #{target_word_count} words total
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                  5. Has 6-10 main sections (H2 headings)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                  6. Each section has 2-4 subsections (H3 headings)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                  7. Includes strategic tool placements where interactive elements would add value
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                  TOOL PLACEMENT GUIDELINES:
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Calculator: for financial/ROI calculations
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Checklist: for step-by-step processes
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Quiz: for self-assessment or knowledge checks
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Comparison: for comparing options/tools
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Only include tools that genuinely add value
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                  Format your response as JSON:
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                  {
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                    "title": "SEO-optimized title with keyword (50-60 chars)",
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                    "meta_description": "Compelling meta description with keyword (150-160 chars)",
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                    "target_word_count": #{target_word_count},
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                    "sections": [
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                      {
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                        "heading": "Section heading (H2)",
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                        "word_count": 400,
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                        "key_points": ["point 1", "point 2", "point 3"],
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                        "subsections": [
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                          {
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                            "heading": "Subsection heading (H3)",
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                            "word_count": 200,
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                            "key_points": ["specific point 1", "specific point 2"]
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                          }
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                        ]
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                      }
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                    ],
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                    "tool_placements": [
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                      {
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                        "type": "calculator",
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                        "title": "ROI Calculator",
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                        "placement": "after_section_2",
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                        "purpose": "Help readers calculate their potential ROI"
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                      }
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

                    ]
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  IMPORTANT:
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Make the outline comprehensive enough to reach #{target_word_count} words
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Include an Introduction section (200-300 words)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Include a Conclusion section (200-300 words)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Distribute word count evenly across sections
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Use specific, actionable section headings
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Reference the real examples and stats provided above in your key_points
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                PROMPT
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                client = Ai::ClientService.for_outline_generation
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                response = client.chat(
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                  messages: [{ role: "user", content: prompt }],
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                  max_tokens: 8000, # Increased from 4000 to handle larger outlines
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                  temperature: 0.7
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil unless response[:success]
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                json_str = extract_json(response[:content])
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                if json_str.nil?
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "No JSON found in response"
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                  return nil
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                outline = JSON.parse(json_str)
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                # Validate outline structure
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                unless outline['sections'].is_a?(Array) && outline['sections'].size >= 4
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "Invalid outline: insufficient sections"
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                  return nil
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                outline
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue JSON::ParserError => e
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Failed to parse outline JSON: #{e.message}"
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "JSON string (first 500 chars): #{json_str[0..500]}" if json_str
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "AI Response (first 1000 chars): #{response[:content][0..1000]}" if response
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Outline generation error: #{e.message}"
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.first(3).join("\n")
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

              def voice_profile_instructions
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                return "" unless @voice_profile.present?
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                <<~VOICE
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                  VOICE PROFILE:
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                  The article should match this writing style:
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{@voice_profile}
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                  Ensure section headings and key points reflect this voice.
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                VOICE
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

              def extract_json(response)
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                # Extract JSON from AI response (might be wrapped in markdown)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                if response.include?("```json")
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                  json = response[/```json\s*(.+?)\s*```/m, 1]
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                  json = response[/```json\s*(.+)/m, 1] if json.nil?
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                  json
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif response.include?("```")
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                  json = response[/```\s*(.+?)\s*```/m, 1]
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                  json = response[/```\s*(.+)/m, 1] if json.nil?
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                  json
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif response.include?("{")
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                  response[/(\{.+\})/m, 1]
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                  response
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      185.

    app/services/article_writer_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    143 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 143 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            
              
            

            # app/services/article_writer_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            # Writes the actual article content based on outline, SERP research, and voice profile
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            class ArticleWriterService
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(keyword, outline, serp_data, voice_profile: nil)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                @keyword = keyword
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                @outline = outline
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                @serp_data = serp_data
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                @voice_profile = voice_profile
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

              def perform
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Writing article for: #{@keyword}"
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                # Write introduction
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                intro = write_introduction
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                return { data: nil, cost: 0.15 } if intro.nil?
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                # Write each section
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                sections = []
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                @outline['sections'].each_with_index do |section_outline, i|
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  next if section_outline['heading']&.downcase&.include?('introduction')
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  next if section_outline['heading']&.downcase&.include?('conclusion')
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "Writing section #{i + 1}/#{@outline['sections'].size}: #{section_outline['heading']}"
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                  section_content = write_section(section_outline, i)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                  sections << section_content if section_content
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                # Write conclusion
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                conclusion = write_conclusion
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                return { data: nil, cost: 0.15 } if conclusion.nil?
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                article_markdown = build_article_markdown(intro, sections, conclusion)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.info "Article written: #{article_markdown.split.size} words"
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                { data: article_markdown, cost: 0.15 } # GPT-4o Mini cost
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

              def write_introduction
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                examples = @serp_data['detailed_examples'] || []
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                statistics = @serp_data['statistics'] || []
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                intro_section = @outline['sections'].find { |s| s['heading']&.downcase&.include?('introduction') }
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                word_count = intro_section&.dig('word_count') || 250
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                prompt = <<~PROMPT
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  Write an engaging introduction for an article about "#{@keyword}".
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                  ARTICLE TITLE: #{@outline['title']}
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                  KEY POINTS TO COVER:
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{intro_section&.dig('key_points')&.join("\n") || "- Hook the reader\n- Explain why this matters\n- Preview what they'll learn"}
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                  AVAILABLE EXAMPLES (use 1-2 if relevant):
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{examples.take(3).map { |ex| "- #{ex['company']}: #{ex['what_they_did']}  #{ex['outcome']}" }.join("\n")}
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                  AVAILABLE STATISTICS (use 1-2 if relevant):
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{statistics.take(3).map { |stat| "- #{stat['stat']} (#{stat['source']})" }.join("\n")}
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{voice_instructions}
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                  TARGET: #{word_count} words
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                  REQUIREMENTS:
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Hook reader in first sentence
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Use a real example or statistic to establish credibility
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Clearly explain what the article will cover
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Write in markdown format
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                  - DO NOT include the heading (I'll add it)
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Use natural, conversational tone
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Avoid AI clichs like "in today's digital landscape" or "in conclusion"
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                PROMPT
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                client = Ai::ClientService.for_article_writing
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                response = client.chat(
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                  messages: [{ role: "user", content: prompt }],
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                  max_tokens: (word_count * 2).to_i, # Tokens  words * 1.3, give buffer
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                  temperature: 0.8
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil unless response[:success]
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                response[:content].strip
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Introduction writing failed: #{e.message}"
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

              def write_section(section_outline, section_index)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                examples = @serp_data['detailed_examples'] || []
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                statistics = @serp_data['statistics'] || []
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                heading = section_outline['heading']
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                word_count = section_outline['word_count'] || 400
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                key_points = section_outline['key_points'] || []
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                subsections = section_outline['subsections'] || []
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                prompt = <<~PROMPT
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  Write a section for an article about "#{@keyword}".
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                  SECTION HEADING: #{heading}
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  KEY POINTS TO COVER:
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{key_points.map { |p| "- #{p}" }.join("\n")}
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{subsections.any? ? "SUBSECTIONS TO INCLUDE:\n#{subsections.map { |s| "- #{s['heading']}: #{s['key_points']&.join(', ')}" }.join("\n")}" : ""}
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  AVAILABLE EXAMPLES (use 2-3 if relevant):
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{examples.take(5).map { |ex| "- #{ex['company']}: #{ex['what_they_did']}  #{ex['outcome']}" }.join("\n")}
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                  AVAILABLE STATISTICS (use 2-3 if relevant):
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{statistics.take(5).map { |stat| "- #{stat['stat']} (#{stat['source']})" }.join("\n")}
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{voice_instructions}
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  TARGET: #{word_count} words
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                  REQUIREMENTS:
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Write in markdown format
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Include the H2 heading: ## #{heading}
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Use H3 headings (###) for subsections
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Use real examples and statistics from the data provided
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Include bullet points or numbered lists where appropriate
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Keep paragraphs short (2-4 sentences)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Use natural, conversational tone
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Avoid AI clichs like "it's important to note" or "remember"
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Make it actionable and specific
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                PROMPT
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                client = Ai::ClientService.for_article_writing
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                response = client.chat(
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                  messages: [{ role: "user", content: prompt }],
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                  max_tokens: (word_count * 2).to_i,
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                  temperature: 0.8
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil unless response[:success]
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                response[:content].strip
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Section #{section_index} writing failed: #{e.message}"
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

              def write_conclusion
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                conclusion_section = @outline['sections'].find { |s| s['heading']&.downcase&.include?('conclusion') }
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                word_count = conclusion_section&.dig('word_count') || 200
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                prompt = <<~PROMPT
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                  Write a conclusion for an article about "#{@keyword}".
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                  ARTICLE TITLE: #{@outline['title']}
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                  KEY POINTS TO COVER:
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{conclusion_section&.dig('key_points')&.join("\n") || "- Summarize main takeaways\n- Call to action\n- Final thought"}
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                  #{voice_instructions}
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                  TARGET: #{word_count} words
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                  REQUIREMENTS:
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Summarize the main insights without being repetitive
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Give readers a clear next step
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                  - End with a thought-provoking question or statement
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Write in markdown format
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                  - DO NOT include the heading (I'll add it)
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                  - Avoid AI clichs like "in conclusion" or "to sum up"
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                PROMPT
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                client = Ai::ClientService.for_article_writing
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                response = client.chat(
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                  messages: [{ role: "user", content: prompt }],
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                  max_tokens: (word_count * 2).to_i,
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                  temperature: 0.8
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil unless response[:success]
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                response[:content].strip
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Conclusion writing failed: #{e.message}"
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

              def build_article_markdown(intro, sections, conclusion)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                parts = []
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                # Title
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                parts << "# #{@outline['title']}\n"
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                # Introduction
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                parts << "#{intro}\n"
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                # Sections (already include their own headings)
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                sections.each do |section|
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                  parts << "\n#{section}\n"
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      203.
