            #!/usr/bin/env ruby
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            # Google Ads API Service for Keyword Research
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

            # Fetches real search volume, CPC, and competition data
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

            require "net/http"
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            require "json"
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            require "uri"
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

            class GoogleAdsService
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

              # Google Ads API requires OAuth setup
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

              # Follow setup guide: https://developers.google.com/google-ads/api/docs/first-call/overview
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                @developer_token = ENV["GOOGLE_ADS_DEVELOPER_TOKEN"]
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                @client_id = ENV["GOOGLE_ADS_CLIENT_ID"]
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                @client_secret = ENV["GOOGLE_ADS_CLIENT_SECRET"]
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                @refresh_token = ENV["GOOGLE_ADS_REFRESH_TOKEN"]
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                @customer_id = ENV["GOOGLE_ADS_CUSTOMER_ID"] # Your Google Ads customer ID (without dashes)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                @access_token = nil
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

              def get_keyword_metrics(keywords)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

                # Keywords can be array or single keyword
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords = [ keywords ] unless keywords.is_a?(Array)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

                if !credentials_present?
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                  puts "    Google Ads API not configured (using heuristics)"
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  return nil
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  refresh_access_token unless @access_token
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Call Google Ads API to get keyword ideas and metrics
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                  results = fetch_keyword_ideas(keywords)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Parse and return metrics
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                  parse_keyword_metrics(results)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue => e
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                  puts "    Google Ads API error: #{e.message}"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  nil
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

              def credentials_present?
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                @developer_token && @client_id && @client_secret && @refresh_token && @customer_id
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

              def refresh_access_token
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                uri = URI("https://oauth2.googleapis.com/token")
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                request.set_form_data(
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                  "client_id" => @client_id,
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                  "client_secret" => @client_secret,
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                  "refresh_token" => @refresh_token,
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                  "grant_type" => "refresh_token"
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                response = Net::HTTP.start(uri.hostname, uri.port, use_ssl: true) do |http|
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                  http.request(request)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                data = JSON.parse(response.body)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                if data["error"]
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                  raise "OAuth error: #{data['error_description']}"
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                @access_token = data["access_token"]
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

              def fetch_keyword_ideas(keywords)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                # Use GenerateKeywordIdeas endpoint
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                # https://developers.google.com/google-ads/api/reference/rpc/v16/KeywordPlanIdeaService
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                uri = URI("https://googleads.googleapis.com/v16/customers/#{@customer_id}/keywordPlanIdeas:generateKeywordIdeas")
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                request["Authorization"] = "Bearer #{@access_token}"
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                request["developer-token"] = @developer_token
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                request["Content-Type"] = "application/json"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                # Request body
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                request.body = {
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywordSeed: {
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                    keywords: keywords
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                  },
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                  geoTargetConstants: [ "geoTargetConstants/2840" ], # United States
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                  language: "languageConstants/1000", # English
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                  includeAdultKeywords: false,
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                  keywordPlanNetwork: "GOOGLE_SEARCH"
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                }.to_json
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                response = Net::HTTP.start(uri.hostname, uri.port, use_ssl: true, read_timeout: 30) do |http|
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                  http.request(request)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                if response.code != "200"
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                  raise "API error (#{response.code}): #{response.body[0..500]}"
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                JSON.parse(response.body)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

              def parse_keyword_metrics(response)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                results = response["results"] || []
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                metrics = {}
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                results.each do |result|
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                  keyword = result.dig("text")
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                  next unless keyword
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Extract metrics
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  keyword_metrics = result["keywordIdeaMetrics"]
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                  next unless keyword_metrics
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Monthly search volume (average over last 12 months)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                  avg_monthly_searches = keyword_metrics.dig("avgMonthlySearches")&.to_i || 0
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Competition level (LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH)
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                  competition = keyword_metrics.dig("competition") || "UNSPECIFIED"
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Competition index (0-100)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                  competition_index = keyword_metrics.dig("competitionIndex")&.to_i || 50
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                  # CPC bid ranges (in micros, need to divide by 1,000,000)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                  low_top_of_page_bid_micros = keyword_metrics.dig("lowTopOfPageBidMicros")&.to_i || 0
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

                  high_top_of_page_bid_micros = keyword_metrics.dig("highTopOfPageBidMicros")&.to_i || 0
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                  low_cpc = low_top_of_page_bid_micros / 1_000_000.0
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                  high_cpc = high_top_of_page_bid_micros / 1_000_000.0
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                  avg_cpc = (low_cpc + high_cpc) / 2.0
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                  metrics[keyword.downcase] = {
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                    volume: avg_monthly_searches,
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                    competition_level: competition,
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                    difficulty: competition_index, # 0-100 scale
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                    cpc: avg_cpc.round(2)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                metrics
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      151.

    app/services/google_suggestions_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    18 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 18 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            
              
            

            # app/services/google_suggestions_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            # Fetches Google autocomplete suggestions for keyword expansion
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            class GoogleSuggestionsService
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(query)
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

                @query = query
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              def fetch
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                uri = URI("http://suggestqueries.google.com/complete/search")
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                params = { client: "firefox", q: @query }
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                uri.query = URI.encode_www_form(params)
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  response = Net::HTTP.get(uri)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                  data = JSON.parse(response)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

                  data[1] || [] # Second element contains suggestions
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue => e
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "GoogleSuggestionsService error: #{e.message}"
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                  []
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      23.

    app/services/keyword_metrics_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    114 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 114 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            
              
            

            # app/services/keyword_metrics_service.rb
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            # Estimates keyword metrics (volume, difficulty, CPC) using heuristics
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

            # Optionally uses Google Ads API for real metrics when configured
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

            class KeywordMetricsService
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(keyword, use_google_ads: false)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

                @keyword = keyword.downcase.strip
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            
              
            

                @use_google_ads = use_google_ads
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

              def calculate
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                # Try Google Ads API first if enabled
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                if @use_google_ads
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  real_metrics = fetch_google_ads_metrics
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                  return real_metrics if real_metrics
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                # Fall back to heuristics
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

                  volume: estimate_volume,
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  difficulty: estimate_difficulty,
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

                  cpc: estimate_cpc,
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  intent: determine_intent,
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                  opportunity: nil # Will be calculated after metrics are set
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

              # Class method for batch fetching from Google Ads API
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
            

              def self.calculate_batch(keywords, use_google_ads: false)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                if use_google_ads
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                  google_ads = GoogleAdsService.new
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                  real_metrics = google_ads.get_keyword_metrics(keywords)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                  if real_metrics
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Return real metrics for each keyword
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                    return keywords.map do |kw|
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                      kw_lower = kw.downcase.strip
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

                      if real_metrics[kw_lower]
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                        {
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                          keyword: kw_lower,
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                          volume: real_metrics[kw_lower][:volume],
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                          difficulty: real_metrics[kw_lower][:difficulty],
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                          cpc: real_metrics[kw_lower][:cpc],
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                          intent: new(kw_lower).send(:determine_intent),
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                          opportunity: nil
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                        }
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Fall back to heuristics for this keyword
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                        new(kw_lower).calculate
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                # Fall back to heuristics for all keywords
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                keywords.map { |kw| new(kw).calculate.merge(keyword: kw.downcase.strip) }
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

              def self.calculate_opportunity(metrics)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

                # Opportunity score: balance between volume and difficulty
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                # Higher volume + lower difficulty = higher opportunity
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                volume_score = normalize(metrics[:volume], max: 500) # Normalize to 0-100
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty_inverse = 100 - metrics[:difficulty] # Invert difficulty
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                # Weighted average (favor volume slightly)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                opportunity = (volume_score * 0.6) + (difficulty_inverse * 0.4)
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                # Boost for good intent
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                opportunity += 5 if ["informational", "educational"].include?(metrics[:intent])
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                opportunity += 10 if metrics[:intent] == "commercial"
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                # Penalty for very low volume
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                opportunity -= 20 if metrics[:volume] < 50
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                [[opportunity, 0].max, 100].min.round
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

              def fetch_google_ads_metrics
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                google_ads = GoogleAdsService.new
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                real_metrics = google_ads.get_keyword_metrics([@keyword])
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                return nil unless real_metrics && real_metrics[@keyword]
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                {
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                  volume: real_metrics[@keyword][:volume],
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                  difficulty: real_metrics[@keyword][:difficulty],
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                  cpc: real_metrics[@keyword][:cpc],
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                  intent: determine_intent,
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                  opportunity: nil
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Google Ads API error for keyword '#{@keyword}': #{e.message}"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

              def estimate_volume
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                # Simple heuristic based on keyword characteristics
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                base = 100
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                # Shorter keywords = higher volume usually
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                base += (50 - @keyword.split.size * 10) if @keyword.split.size <= 5
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

                # Common topics
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                base += 200 if @keyword.include?("seo") || @keyword.include?("marketing")
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                base += 150 if @keyword.include?("startup") || @keyword.include?("business")
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                base += 100 if @keyword.include?("content") || @keyword.include?("article")
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                # Question keywords = medium volume
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                base += 50 if @keyword.start_with?("how to", "what is", "why", "when")
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                # Long-tail = lower volume
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                base -= @keyword.split.size * 20 if @keyword.split.size > 4
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                # Tool/product keywords
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                base += 100 if @keyword.include?("tool") || @keyword.include?("software") || @keyword.include?("generator")
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                # Free = higher volume
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                base += 80 if @keyword.include?("free")
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                # Template/checklist = moderate volume
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                base += 60 if @keyword.include?("template") || @keyword.include?("checklist")
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                [base, 10].max # Minimum 10
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

              def estimate_difficulty
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                # Estimate how hard it is to rank (0 = easy, 100 = impossible)
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty = 50 # Start at medium
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                # Shorter keywords = harder
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty += (5 - @keyword.split.size) * 10 if @keyword.split.size < 5
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                # Competitive terms
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty += 20 if @keyword.include?("best")
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty += 15 if @keyword.split.size <= 2 # Very broad
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty -= 15 if @keyword.split.size >= 5 # Long-tail = easier
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                # Question keywords = easier (less competitive)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty -= 10 if @keyword.start_with?("how to", "what is", "why")
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                # Tool/product = competitive
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty += 10 if @keyword.include?("tool") || @keyword.include?("software")
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                # Specific modifiers = easier
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty -= 5 if @keyword.include?("free")
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty -= 10 if @keyword.include?("template") || @keyword.include?("checklist")
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                # Very specific = easier
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                difficulty -= 15 if @keyword.split.size >= 6
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                [[difficulty, 0].max, 100].min # Clamp between 0-100
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

              def estimate_cpc
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                # Rough CPC estimate (in reality, use Google Keyword Planner)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                base_cpc = 1.50
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                base_cpc += 1.0 if @keyword.include?("startup") || @keyword.include?("business") || @keyword.include?("marketing")
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                base_cpc += 0.50 if @keyword.include?("tool") || @keyword.include?("software")
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                base_cpc -= 0.75 if @keyword.include?("free")
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                base_cpc += 0.25 if @keyword.include?("best")
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                base_cpc += 0.50 if @keyword.include?("seo")
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                [base_cpc, 0.10].max.round(2)
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

              def determine_intent
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                # What is the user trying to do?
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                return "navigational" if @keyword.include?("login") || @keyword.include?("sign up")
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                return "commercial" if @keyword.include?("tool") || @keyword.include?("software") || @keyword.include?("best")
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                return "transactional" if @keyword.include?("free") || @keyword.include?("online") || @keyword.include?("template")
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                return "informational" if @keyword.start_with?("how to", "what is", "why", "when")
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                return "educational" if @keyword.include?("guide") || @keyword.include?("tutorial") || @keyword.include?("framework")
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                "mixed"
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

              def self.normalize(value, max:)
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                # Normalize value to 0-100 scale
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                ((value.to_f / max) * 100).round
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      186.

    app/services/keyword_research_service.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    100.0% branches covered

    128 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 128 lines missed.
    0 total branches, 0 branches covered and 0 branches missed.
